com.topcoder.configuration
Class BaseConfigurationObject

java.lang.Object
  com.topcoder.configuration.BaseConfigurationObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, ConfigurationObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
TemplateConfigurationObject
public abstract class BaseConfigurationObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigurationObject

An abstract adapter implementation of ConfigurationObject interface. All the methods in this class always throw UnsupportedOperationException, except the clone method. This class exists as convenience for creating custom ConfigurationObject.

Extend this class to create a custom ConfigurationObject and override the only the methods which can be supported by certain configuration strategy.

Thread safe: This class has no state, and thus it is thread safe.

Version:
1.0
Author:
maone, TCSDEVELOPER

findDescendants

public ConfigurationObject[] findDescendants(java.lang.String path)
                                      throws ConfigurationAccessException

Get descendants specified by the given path. The path may contain wildcards, like * and ?. The path should be sepatated by slash or back slash characters. So if the descendant name contains slashes, this method may return invalid results.

Note:

  • Heading or trailing slashes will be ignored.
  • Continuous slashes will be considered as one.
    • Always throws UnsupportedOperationException.

    Specified by:
    findDescendants in interface ConfigurationObject
    Parameters:
    path - the path used to retrieved descendants.
    Returns:
    all the descendants specified by the path, or an empty array if nothing is matched.
    Throws:
    java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - Always thrown.
    ConfigurationAccessException - Never thrown, kept for sub-class to use it.

    deleteDescendants

    public ConfigurationObject[] deleteDescendants(java.lang.String path)
                                        throws ConfigurationAccessException

    Delete descendants specified by the given path. The path may contain wildcards, like * and ?. The path should be sepatated by slash or back slash characters. So if the descendant name contains slashes, this method may return invalid results.

    Note:

  • Heading or trailing slashes will be ignored.
  • Continuous slashes will be considered as one.
    • Always throws UnsupportedOperationException.

    Specified by:
    deleteDescendants in interface ConfigurationObject
    Parameters:
    path - the path used to retrieved descendants.
    Returns:
    all the descendants specified by the path, or an empty array if nothing is matched.
    Throws:
    java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the path is null.
    ConfigurationAccessException - Never thrown, kept for sub-class to use it.

    processDescendants

    public void processDescendants(java.lang.String path,
                               Processor processor)
                        throws ConfigurationAccessException,
                               ProcessException

    Process descendants by the given processor. Always throws UnsupportedOperationException.

    Specified by:
    processDescendants in interface ConfigurationObject
    Parameters:
    path - path to find descendants
    processor - processor used to process all descendants
    Throws:
    java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any arg is null
    ConfigurationAccessException - if any error occurs while accessing the configuration
    ProcessException - propagated from processor
    java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - always throw
